attributes.action: Cancel 2021 exams in line with Scotland and Wales.
attributes.additional_details: This is the only fair way to assess students as teachers can assess individuals better than an exam board. Covid 19 has created an unfair playing field due to different infection rates and isolation rules from area to area. The current students have suffered more loss of education time and stress due to the current situation than the last year that had exams cancelled.
attributes.background: Cancel GCSE and A level exams in England in line with the rest of the UK. Base results on coursework and teacher assessments.
